docs.snippet: Yoenis Cespedes, one of baseball’s most exciting players, who is tasked with reinvigorating a lackluster franchise, has been described as quirky but infectious....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes, one of baseball’s most exciting players, who is tasked with reinvigorating a lackluster franchise, has been described as quirky but infectious.
docs.abstract: Profile of outfielder Yoenis Cespedes, for whom New York Mets signed to help team reach the playoffs; Cespedes batted .350 over two playoff series with Oakland Athletics and won 2013 Home Run Derby at Citi Field.

headline.main: Enigmatic Cespedes Is Charged With Lighting Up New York Again
headline.print_headline: Electric Cespedes Is Asked to Light Up New York Once More
